title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Leaves", 1800–1818
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper
inscribed: Lower right, pen and brown ink, LAD 82
dimensions:
Sheet: 17 x 22.3 cm (6 11/16 x 8 3/4 in)
Image: 10.3 x 15.2 cm (4 1/16 in x 6 in)

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Leaves", 1800–1818.
1800–1818. Brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1957-46-44.
